metadata.dc:author: Marsicano, L
Hernández, D
Nardulli Fernández, G
Ramón Poleo, J R
Sukerman, V
Olavarría, R
Almosny, I
metadata.dc:description: We report two cases of Primary small Intestinal Lymphoma (IPSID), in adults. The clinical presentation was, watery diarrhea and weight loss. The histology of this cases was non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma, and the treatment was chemotherapy.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad inmunoproliferativa primaria del intestino delgado (IPSID).
[Primary immunoproliferative small intestinal disease].
